subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Turkey stunned the Czech Republic with three goals in the final 15 minutes, including two in three minutes, for a 3-2 victory Sunday in Geneva that lifted the Turks into the European Championship quarterfinals.
snippet: Turkey stunned the Czech Republic with three goals in the final 15 minutes, including two in three minutes, for a 3-2 victory Sunday in Geneva that lifted the Turks into the European Championship quarterfinals.
